courseDescription:
If you need a comprehensive guide to supporting the flow of traffic through a network, then this VMWare vSphere 5 - Network Configuration, Storage, and VM Creation free online course is exactly where you should start. This course also enables you to enhance network security and -stability and configuration management to keep accurate network configuration records and to help organizations avoid potential challenges or problems within their networks. A Virtualization Platform attempts to present a generic hardware interface to a virtual guest and VMware vSphere 5.0 is an industry-leading Virtualization Technology Platform used by many organizations.

This VMWare vSphere 5 course covers topics like Network Configuration, Configuring Storage, VM Creation, Configuration, and Snapshots. You will learn how to use the Network Configuration Manager and Configuration Tools to provide automated data tracking and reporting. This is important to do because it allows administrators to spot any configuration changes and potential threats or issues. It is also an easy way to make bulk changes, such as a network-wide password change in a situation where passwords are compromised. Storage Concepts deals with understanding how storage integrates with the virtual infrastructure and the course explains this along with Internet Small Computer Systems Interface (iSCSI) that uses the TCP/IP protocol to enable long-distance IP routing without the requirement of any external gateway hardware. The purpose of Virtual Machine Creation is to provide a platform-independent programming environment that executes in the same way, regardless of the underlying hardware or operating system, and the final part of this course comprehensively covers this. The course concludes by discussing all concepts related to VM Creation such as how to create Multiple VMs, Templates and Clones, Virtual Appliances, VMware Converter, Configuration and Snapshots.

This in-depth course empowers you to use the VMWare vSphere 5 platform in order to manage this technology efficiently and effectively. If you use VMWare in your current role or are a student needing to enhance your skills, then you should enrol in this VMWare vSphere 5 - Network Configuration, Storage, and VM Creation free online course.
